article.headline: La Salle 75, St. Bonaventure 73
article.story: OLEAN, N.Y. -- Steve Weingarten hit the go-ahead 3-pointer with 32 seconds left in the second overtime as 10th-seeded La Salle knocked off seventh-seeded St. Bonaventure 75-73 Tuesday night to reach the quarterfinals of the Atlantic 10 Conference tournament. The Explorers (15-17), who will play No. 2 seed Temple on Friday, trailed by 14 in regulation and overcame a seven-point deficit with 1:22 left in the first overtime. The Bonnies (16-14) led 71-67 with 3:04 remaining, then Jerrell Williams, who paced La Salle with 19 points, made a layup and Tyreek Duren's two free throws tied it with 2:32 left. After Michael Davenport hit two foul shots to push St. Bonaventure ahead with 42 seconds to go, Weingarten hit his 3. Ruben Guillandeaux added 18 points for the Explorers, including the tying shots in regulation and the first OT. Andrew Nicholson's 30 points led the Bonnies.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
